text: e, the direct object marker is a word in the Toki Pona language. It can be put before a word in the sentence to show that is the direct object. e.g. mi moku e telo - I drink the water. e.g. ona li moku e kili - He eats a vegetable as you can see from the examples above, it shows that the word after it is a direct object. ==References==
title: Direct object
